content.rendered:
Odibet Review.

This is a new entrant into the Kenyan market and it is taking over by storm. Their intense advertising campaign is evident in the number of matatus and billboards with their logo. On social media as well, they have ensured their marketing campaign is on another level. Their social media hashtag is #BetExtraODInary, and has trended and won the company a vast market base. The biggest target of theirarketing was the youth and it is safe to say that their strategy worked. 

Odibets at a glance.

Features – 7/10

User Experience – 7/10

Offers – 6/10

Odds – 6/10

Summary.

Odibets is a betsite that is designed to capture and perfectly fit into the local market. A challenge with this design is that it is bound to be devoid of top-tier betting features that attract big money clients. 

OVERALL

6.4/10   

USER REVIEW 3.48 (25 votes)

Get more information of Betika

In-depth Review.

Odibets is a betting company that was well thought of and meticulously planned before being launched. It incorporates almost all the features that many Kenyans look for in a betting site. Whether you are talking about bonuses, promotions or even in-play features, Odibets has it all. It offers games on almost every professional sport in existence. If you like betting on different sporting events, then Odibets is likely to keep you glued to your screen for hours on end.

They have a simple and easy to use interface that makes it possible for you to select your preferred sport event and go back to your home screen with ease. They also have a cool dark theme with is friendly to your eyes and they have the best odds. Away from their website, they are known for their charity and sponsorship programs throughout the country. They sponsor a number of local teams including Mathare United. Their site is preferred by many because it offers local matches and has good betting odds in place.

Features

Free Bet

At Odibets, all new members are entitled to a free bet which is worth Kshs 30.

Odi Data Bundle

 This is a feature that is applicable to all new members. Upon placing their first bets after registration, they are entitled to a compulsory 7mbs and 7 sms after which members will be selected at random and take part in the daily draw which will see one if them part with 2GB data bundles.

Free first deposit of the day

Many people get this twisted. What this bonus simply means is that the transaction cost incurred while depositing money into your account will be credited into that same account, provided the value of your deposit exceeds Ksh 49.

Cashback

This is one useful strategy employed by Odibets. They ensure you get half of your first bet amount if the bet in question was lost. This is applicable for amounts not exceeding Ksh 200 and any amount above it will see you receive a fixed Ksh 100.

Deposits

Deposits can be done in two ways;

The first option is where you deposit directly from the site by going to the DEPOSIT tab on Odibets.com and enter the amount you wish to deposit. This will be followed by a pop-up message on your phone requesting you to accept and key in your pin.

 The second way is the old fashioned one where you get to go to M-PESA Menu and select Lipa na M-PESA, Pay Bill. 290680 as the Business Number and ODI as the account number. From here you enter the amount and press in your pin.

Odibets offers you multiple sports events to choose from on a daily basis. There more than 500 sporting events that take place each day and odibets ensures that you have access to all of them. Their livebet feature sees to it that you are able to follow ongoing sports events and make a bet if your choice. Some of the popular sporting events include: football, tennis, basketball, ice hockey, cricket, American football, boxing, snooker, volleyball, handball, MMA and rugby.

Learn more information about Dafabet

Pros.

Free bet to members.

Multiple sporting events

Boosted odds.

You can bet with as low as kshs 1.

Withdrawals can be done via SMS.

Customer service is 24/7.

On-site deposits.

User-friendly website.

There is live betting.

Cons.

No jackpot.

Deposits are charged.

No cash out.

Boosted odds

Odilive

Odileague
